bug.author: adrienrenaud
bug.summary: Training on Amazon Web Service: ami-6880c317 not found
bug.description:
The refered AMI in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/ml-agents/blob/master/docs/Training-on-Amazon-Web-Service.md>https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/ml-agents/blob/master/docs/Training-on-Amazon-Web-Service.md</denchmark-link>
is not found in AWS: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6208157/41784526-4082b85c-7640-11e8-92b0-03519d0cebe8.PNG></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/adrienrenaud>@adrienrenaud</denchmark-link> , thanks for the note. The correct ami is ami-18642967. We've changed the ami along with the ML-Agents v0.4 release, but the ami id change is still in the hotfix-0 branch that is to be merged.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/xiaomaogy>@xiaomaogy</denchmark-link> did it change again? I can't find it with the id ami-18642967
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/m4Ssa>@m4Ssa</denchmark-link> - the AMI did not change. Are you checking in the us-east-1 region?

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mmattar>@mmattar</denchmark-link> , since im waiting for an aws account for my coropration I can only use the <denchmark-link:https://aws.amazon.com/marketplace/search/results?x=0&y=0&searchTerms=ami-6880c317&page=1&ref_=nav_search_box/>marketplace</denchmark-link> as a reference and I can't find it there. Other ami-id's work fine.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/m4Ssa>@m4Ssa</denchmark-link> I just checked and you can find it in the Community amis, which is different from the marketplace.
Thanks for reaching out to us. Hopefully you were able to resolve your issue. We are closing this due to inactivity, but if you need additional assistance, feel free to reopen the issue.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
